backgrounds.name: bg-stone-01
backgrounds.prompt: Photorealistic stone wall background inspired by British parliamentary architecture. Large limestone and concrete panels with subtle expansion joints, fine grain, faint pitting and soot. Calm, diffuse overcast lighting; no hard shadows or dramatic highlights. Neutral limestone/ash/charcoal tones; restrained contrast (avoid banding). No text, people, props, fantasy, or cathedral interiors. High spatial detail, realistic texture, no painterly smoothing. Reduce visual drama; flatten lighting.

backgrounds.name: bg-stone-02
backgrounds.prompt: Variation: photorealistic stone/concrete wall, slightly darker and more weathered, with faint vertical streaks. Soft diffuse lighting; neutral ash/limestone/charcoal tones; restrained contrast; no banding. No people, text, props, fantasy, or cathedral details. High spatial detail and realistic texture. Reduce visual drama.

overlays.name: overlay-vignette
overlays.prompt: Subtle grayscale vignette overlay: soft edge darkening and faint soot haze, smooth fade to neutral center. Monochrome, no hard edges, no banding. Transparent background. Designed for low-opacity UI overlay. Reduce visual drama.

overlays.name: overlay-vault-ribs
overlays.prompt: Subtle architectural rib shadow overlay (Parliament style). Diffuse low-contrast implied ribs; no ornate detail. Grayscale, very low opacity, transparent background. Scalable SVG intent, smooth gradients, no hard edges. Reduce visual drama.

overlays.name: overlay-tracery-corners
overlays.prompt: Very subtle tracery corner motif inspired by parliamentary stonework. Thin, broken lines that fade into transparency. Grayscale, transparent background, minimal visual dominance. Reduce visual drama.

overlays.name: overlay-cracks
overlays.prompt: Sparse hairline crack overlay: thin, irregular branching cracks. Grayscale, transparent background, low density, seamless. Designed to fade in for subtle structural strain. Reduce visual drama.

overlays.name: overlay-dust
overlays.prompt: Sparse dust mote overlay: tiny irregular particles, low density. Grayscale, transparent background, suitable for slow upward animation. Reduce visual drama.
